summary: Build a professional animated portfolio website for a software developer highlighting 9+ years of experience, 100+ websites across multiple domains, app development projects, and digital marketing/SEO/graphic design services.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Abstract premium hero background illustration with subtle tech motifs (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Minimal line-icon set (consistent stroke) representing: School, Real Estate, E-commerce, Fintech, Cryptocurrency, Travel (icons-set.dim_1024x1024.png)
- Minimal line-icon set (consistent stroke) representing: Digital Marketing, SEO, Graphic Design, Web Development, App Development (services-icons.dim_1024x1024.png)
- Timeline decorative illustration element (e.g., vertical path/constellation style) (timeline-accent.dim_1200x2400.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page (or small multi-section) developer portfolio site with clear navigation and sections for: Hero/Intro, 9+ years journey (timeline), Websites experience (100+), App development experience, Digital marketing/SEO, Graphic design services, and Contact/CTA.

Implement a polished animation system that visually tells the developer’s “9+ years journey” in a professional way, including a timeline section with animated milestones revealed on scroll (e.g., fade/slide, parallax accents, progress indicator).

Add a “Work / Projects” presentation that clearly communicates breadth without listing 100+ items: include category-based highlights for Websites (Schools, Real Estate, E-commerce, Other) and Apps (Fintech, Cryptocurrency, Real Estate, E-commerce, Travel), with a clean, filterable or tabbed UI and short descriptions per category.

Add a “Services” section positioning the developer as a “one stop solution” including: Web development, App development, Digital marketing, SEO, and Graphic design, with concise service cards and a clear primary CTA leading to the contact section.

Create a contact section suitable for a portfolio site: include a simple contact form UI (name, email, message) and also display optional contact methods placeholders (e.g., email/LinkedIn) without requiring third-party integrations.

Apply one coherent, distinctive visual theme for a premium, professional portfolio (avoid default/template look), including consistent typography, spacing system, and a restrained color palette (do not use a blue+purple dominant scheme).

Add static generated image assets to elevate visual quality (hero background/illustration and a small set of category/service icons) and render them from the frontend as static files (do not proxy images through the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create an animated, professional portfolio site showcasing 9+ years journey, 100+ website projects (schools/real estate/ecommerce/etc.), app development (fintech/crypto/real estate/ecommerce/travel), and digital marketing/SEO/graphic design offerings

projectName: Animated developer portfolio highlighting 9+ years journey, 100+ websites, apps, and digital services
